Header.title: Real Estate Agent / Realtor / Investor
Header.paragraph: Silicon Valleyâ€™s Real Estate Agent Serving San Jose, Cupertino, Santa Clara & surrounding areas

About.paragraph1: Competitive chess player & motorcycle rider - she brings her data analytics skills and bold personality to Real Estate.
About.paragraph2: Penny is passionate & committed to help people to minimize risks and maximize results, advising the best strategies to becoming financially independent using Real Estate as a mean. Looking to buying, selling or investing in real estate in Silicon Valley? Penny has helped many buyers/sellers/investors in negotiation, marketing, time management, contract writings, and has a proven track record of providing excellent and life-changing services. She is committed to excellency and integrity, and has your best interest at heart, guilding you to achieve your goals. Contact Penny for a free 30 mins consultation - it's free!
